title: Applying Modality Principles to VR-Based Language Learning Projects

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and experience with digital devices
context.additional_context: Establishing a smartphone-based VR learning environment and developing language tasks applicable to real-world contexts.

learning_goals: Learners can select the modality (text or audio explanation) suitable for learning objectives in a VR environment with 80% accuracy
Learners can focus visual attention on key learning areas at an average of 70% or higher when performing VR-based PBL tasks
Learners can apply acquired knowledge in real-world language usage contexts with over 90% accuracy through project deliverables

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
